# Log in to view your accounts

Orrstown Online Banking gives you a variety of services that help you use and manage your accounts, whenever and wherever you want.

Username

Enter your Password

[Password Reset](https://online.orrstown.com/forgot "Password Reset") | [Enroll](https://online.orrstown.com/enroll "Enroll") | [Demo](https://online.orrstown.com/demo "Demo") | [Online Security](/fraud-and-security "Online Security")

Login

Enter your Username

Enter your Password

Login

![](https://banno.com:443/a/assets/api/institutions/6627/assets/26f06380-b6bd-11e4-9d22-0e26ff42d0f8) **It's no secret.****Orrstown has a Checking Account that rewards you.**[Learn more about our new Relationship Premier Checking Account.](https://www.orrstown.com/personal-and-business/personal-checking-accounts)

# Log in to our Wealth Portals

Orrstown Financial Advisors make it easy to manage all of your accounts with our simple online portals

  * [NetXInvestor](https://www.netxinvestor.com/web/netxinvestor/login "NetXInvestor")
  * [Albridge](https://www3.mainaccount.com/can/ "Albridge")
  * [OFA Accunet](https://ofa.accessasc.com "OFA Accunet")
  * [Investor Relations](/corporate-profile/default.aspx "Investor Relations")
